bill_title: Honoring Korbin Leddy for being named one of the top youth volunteers in South Dakota for 2020 through the Prudential Spirit of Community Award.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Korbin Leddy for being named one of the top youth volunteers in South Dakota for 2020 through the Prudential Spirit of Community Award. WHEREAS, Korbin Leddy, an esteemed resident of Stockholm, South Dakota, and a student at Milbank High School, has achieved national recognition for exemplary volunteer service by receiving a 2020 Prudential Spirit of Community Award; and WHEREAS, this prestigious award, presented by Prudential Financial in partnership with the National Association of Secondary School Principals, honors young volunteers across America who have demonstrated an extraordinary commitment to serving their communities; and WHEREAS, Mr. Leddy earned this award by generously giving his time and energy to helping the fight to end hunger, has donated over 770 pounds of surplus garden produce from his family's garden to his local food pantry; and WHEREAS, Mr. Leddy has recruited other students also to donate their garden surplus and help pack over 30,000 fortified rice meals for Native American reservations and areas around the world affected by disasters; and WHEREAS, the success of the state of South Dakota, the strength of our communities, and the overall vitality of American society depend, in great measure, upon the dedication of young people like Mr. Leddy who use their considerable talents and resources to serve others: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Mr. Korbin Leddy be congratulated and commended as the recipient of a 2020 Prudential Spirit of Community Award, recognized for his outstanding record of volunteer service, peer leadership, community spirit, and the Legislature extends best wishes for his continued success.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Korbin Leddy for being named one of the top youth volunteers in South Dakota for 2020 through the Prudential Spirit of Community Award. WHEREAS, Korbin Leddy, an esteemed resident of Stockholm, South Dakota, and a student at Milbank High School, has achieved national recognition for exemplary volunteer service by receiving a 2020 Prudential Spirit of Community Award; and WHEREAS, this prestigious award, presented by Prudential Financial in partnership with the National Association of Secondary School Principals, honors young volunteers across America who have demonstrated an extraordinary commitment to serving their communities; and WHEREAS, Mr. Leddy earned this award by generously giving his time and energy to helping the fight to end hunger, has donated over 770 pounds of surplus garden produce from his family's garden to his local food pantry; and WHEREAS, Mr. Leddy has recruited other students also to donate their garden surplus and help pack over 30,000 fortified rice meals for Native American reservations and areas around the world affected by disasters; and WHEREAS, the success of the state of South Dakota, the strength of our communities, and the overall vitality of American society depend, in great measure, upon the dedication of young people like Mr. Leddy who use their considerable talents and resources to serve others: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Mr. Korbin Leddy be congratulated and commended as the recipient of a 2020 Prudential Spirit of Community Award, recognized for his outstanding record of volunteer service, peer leadership, community spirit, and the Legislature extends best wishes for his continued success.
